{"id":455908920,"lang":"cpp","time":"7 months, 1 week","timestamp":1613300877,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"24 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/455908920/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Max Area of Island","memory":"23.1 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    void bfs(vector<vector<int>>& grid, int a, int b, int& count) {\n        if(grid.size() <= a || a < 0 || grid[0].size() <= b || b < 0) return;\n        \n        if(grid[a][b] == 1) {\n            grid[a][b] = 2;\n            ++count;\n            bfs(grid, a - 1, b, count);\n            bfs(grid, a + 1, b, count);\n            bfs(grid, a, b - 1, count);\n            bfs(grid, a, b + 1, count);\n        } \n        \n    }\n    \n    int maxAreaOfIsland(vector<vector<int>>& grid) {\n        int maxCount = 0;\n        \n        for(int i = 0; i < grid.size(); ++i) {\n            for(int j = 0; j < grid[0].size(); ++j) {\n                if(grid[i][j] == 1) {\n                    int count = 0;\n                    \n                    bfs(grid, i, j, count);\n                    \n                    maxCount = max(count, maxCount);\n                }\n            }\n        }\n        \n        return maxCount;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"max-area-of-island"}
